question: Identify the top three companies based on their IT budget and analyze their technology adoption trends.

subtasks.task: Retrieve the top three companies based on IT budget sorted in descending order.
For each of the top three companies, gather their technology stack information to analyze trends in technology adoption.
Collect deal information related to these companies to further analyze the financial implications of technology adoption.
Examine the focus areas of these companies to understand their strategic technology initiatives.
Gather social media engagement metrics to evaluate how these companies communicate their technology strategies externally.
